[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=body.txt
configuration=quarantine-evaluation.conf
actions=end-of-message-quarantine

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--quarantine;MAYBE VIRUS

[client10027]
port=10027

[end-of-message-quarantine]
command=end-of-message

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=continue

quarantine_reasons=

chunks=;Hi,;
end_of_message_chunks=;;
headers=From:kou+sender@example.com
